articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Ukraine updates: EU leaders to meet at defense summit - DW (English)
articles.description: EU leaders and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy were to meet to discuss boosting European countries' defense spending. Meanwhile, France's Emmanuel Macron showed openness to sharing Paris' nuclear deterrent.
articles.content:
Russian lawmakers and other officials slammed French President Emmanuel Macron on Thursday for saying that Russia posed a threat to Europe.
Former Russian President Dmitry Medvedev, who now heads th… [+757 chars]
